icebird.frostmoure_lore.6: II. Increase 16%% of Â§binteraction rangeÂ§r and Â§bmovement speedÂ§r

icebird.frostmoure_lore.13: "A blade forged in the heart of winterâ€™s night, a relic of a king, consumed by blight.
icebird.frostmoure_lore.14: A vessel of souls, a thirst for more, a power that corrupts to its core.
icebird.frostmoure_lore.15: With frost and shadow, it binds its prey, a sirenâ€™s song that leads souls astray.
icebird.frostmoure_lore.16: A hunger for strength, a craving deep, until the wielder is lost in sleep.
icebird.frostmoure_lore.17: "Absolute power, absolute decay," a mantra whispered through the fray.
icebird.frostmoure_lore.18: The blade's cold touch, a chilling caress, a path to madness, a soul's distress.
icebird.frostmoure_lore.19: "Scar of Frost Throne," a chilling name, for those who wield its icy flame.
icebird.frostmoure_lore.20: A mindless rage, a bloody spree, no friend or foe is safe, you see."
icebird.frostmoure_lore.21: -- A Crown of Frost and Shadow.

icebird.boss1.intro:
Â§3Â§o<Frostrate Spirit> Â§fThis Frost Core is established by the instigator, Ansurae Wrynn. So... I really don't know what skill it is, I'm so sorry :P 

After all, you won't read if I give you, right? haha

icebird.coldnpc_1: Â§3Â§o<Frostrate Spirit>Â§f It's so cold here...oh, hola adventurer! You said that we've seen in somewhere...maybe it's my shard that flew away there. This is my real body, my name is Â§3Frostrate SpiritÂ§f, a spirit of here, Frostrate Spike. A few years ago, Â§cAnsurae WrynnÂ§f, a self-proclaimed "Lich King of Frost Throne" man captured here, establishing a Â§cFrost CoreÂ§f in the palace on the top of the mountain, making this spike suffering bitterly cold winter for a long time...
icebird.coldnpc_2: Â§7>>Â§3>Â§f I agree, but I think not only "cold"...
icebird.coldnpc_3: Â§3Â§o<Frostrate Spirit> Â§fAccording to the research, it's the effect was brought from the Â§cFrost CoreÂ§f, called Â§2"Oscura Touch"Â§f, making creatures suffering this cold inflicting different negative effects. What's more, Â§cit just can be decelerated, cannot dispelÂ§f...
icebird.coldnpc_4: Â§7>>Â§3>Â§f What's the detail of the "negative effects"?
icebird.coldnpc_6: Â§3Â§o<Frostrate Spirit> Â§fOscura Touch will increase with time, the time will accelerate if step on water or iced-block.
icebird.coldnpc_7: What will inflict according to the level of that:
icebird.coldnpc_8: 1. Â§b>20%% Â§9Â§lâ„Â§fÂ§lâ„â„â„â„Â§r Frostbite Â§7>>Â§3>Â§c -30%% Movement Speed
icebird.coldnpc_9: 2. Â§b>40%% Â§9Â§lâ„â„Â§fÂ§lâ„â„â„Â§r Bi-Frostbite Â§7>>Â§3>Â§c Remove regen effects.
icebird.coldnpc_11: 4. Â§b>80%% Â§9Â§lâ„â„â„â„Â§fÂ§lâ„Â§r Quar-Frostbite Â§7>>Â§3>Â§c -30%% Movement Speed extra and periodically darkness
icebird.coldnpc_12: 5. Â§b>80%% Â§9Â§lâ„â„â„â„â„Â§r Oscura Frozen Â§7>>Â§3>Â§c Oscura has pierced your body and gradually eroding, inflict 8 true damage every 2 sec.
icebird.coldnpc_13: Â§7>>Â§3>Â§f That's horrible... that how to decelerate "Oscura Touch"?
icebird.coldnpc_14: Â§3Â§o<Frostrate Spirit> Â§fWe found some simple ways to effectively decelerate that:
icebird.coldnpc_15: 1. Stay at light=15 places. Â§7(Caution: Torch's light=Â§c14Â§7)
icebird.coldnpc_16: 2. Â§bOn fireÂ§f, including lava and fire.
icebird.coldnpc_17: 3. Consume Â§6"Embercore"Â§f enchantment food, the special way of processing food here.
icebird.coldnpc_18:
*Â§6"Embercore"Â§f FoodÂ§f:
 1. Consume time fixed to 0.5 sec and can always eat.
 2. Fixed to restore 9 Hunger and 14 Saturation.
 3. Dispel all slowness effects and Â§breduce 10%%Â§f of "Osucra Touch".
